original_title: ほんとにあった怖い話
overview: True ghost stories described and/or narrated by the survivor involved and commences with the name and location of the one submitting the story. Each of the three collections begins with a series of creepy real-life photographs in which strange appendages or faces appear while a rather ominous narrator suggests you are now entering the highway to HELL.  Three stories in the first TV-movie:  The Lonely Girl  Spiritual Flight  Mystery of the Red Earring
tagline: (DVD Release including all three TV-movies): Ten Haunting Tales from the Japanese Underground.
title: Scary True Stories
